description.zh-CN: 一个富文本区域组件，结合了基础文本区域功能和增强特性，如自动增长高度、字符计数器和格式化提示。支持markdown预览、语法高亮和可自定义的占位符文本。
description.en-US: A rich textarea component that combines basic textarea functionality with enhanced features like auto-growing height, character counters, and comprehensive formatting hints. Supports markdown preview, syntax highlighting, and fully customizable placeholder text.

description.zh-CN: 功能丰富的文本区域实现，具有自动扩展行为、有用的字符计数和清晰的视觉反馈。提供增强的文本输入体验，具有改进用户生产力的深思熟虑的功能。
description.en-US: A feature-rich textarea implementation with auto-expanding behavior, helpful character counting, clear visual feedback, and responsive design. Provides enhanced text input experience with thoughtful features and intuitive controls that improve overall user productivity.
